analysis.description:
ST20EToken.transferRequestStatus (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#291-294) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- requestTransfer (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#515-524)
	- batchRequestTransfer (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#525-547)
	- fullTransferRequest (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#550-561)
	- batchFullTransferRequest (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#561-586)
	- getTransferRequestStatus (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol:
	Contract ST20EToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#410-411)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

ST20EToken.name (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#265-266) shadows:
	- ERC20.name (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#34-35)

ST20EToken.symbol (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#267-270) shadows:
	- ERC20.symbol (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#35)

ST20EToken.decimals (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#270) shadows:
	- ERC20.decimals (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#35)

ST20EToken.multiTransfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- kycVerification.isVerified(_to[_interator]) == false (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#505-506)

Reentrancy in ST20EToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#474-480):
	External calls:
	- kycVerification.isVerified(_to) == false (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#478-479)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c50079cc96284c1e01e3a66fc38af090289b4ee.sol#480)
